DemoSection.cta_text: Want to see it live? Join early access and we'll give you a personal walkthrough.

ProblemSection.subtitle: The Problem
ProblemSection.title: Your JavaScript Site is Invisible to AI
ProblemSection.description: While you're optimizing for Google, AI search engines can't see your content
ProblemSection.problem1_description: ChatGPT's GPTBot and Perplexity's crawler hit your site and see... nothing. Just a loading spinner and empty divs. Your React/Vue/Angular app never renders.
ProblemSection.problem2_description: When users ask ChatGPT or Perplexity about your product category, your competitors get cited. You don't. You're losing qualified leads to brands with worse products but better AI visibility.
ProblemSection.problem3_description: Building your own prerendering infrastructure means: Setting up headless Chrome, managing render queues, handling cache invalidation, monitoring uptime, and debugging edge cases. That's 3-6 months of dev time.
ProblemSection.opportunity_description: Every day you're invisible, your competitors are building AI search authority.
ProblemSection.cta_text: Don't let AI search engines ignore your content

SocialProofSection.subtitle: Who Benefits Most
SocialProofSection.title: Built for JavaScript-Heavy Businesses
SocialProofSection.description: Join companies already optimizing for AI search visibility
SocialProofSection.profile1_description: React, Vue, Angular SPAs with 500-50K pages. Product-led growth companies where AI search visibility drives signups.
SocialProofSection.profile1_pain_description: ChatGPT can't index our feature pages. AI demos our competitors but not us.
SocialProofSection.profile1_solution_description: Get cited in AI answers when users search for solutions in your category
SocialProofSection.profile1_roi: ROI: 10-50 qualified leads/month from AI search
SocialProofSection.profile2_description: Headless commerce, custom React storefronts with 1K-50K product SKUs and dynamic filtering.
SocialProofSection.profile2_pain_description: Products not appearing in ChatGPT shopping recommendations. Losing to Amazon.
SocialProofSection.profile2_solution_description: Products appear in AI shopping answers with optimized schema markup
SocialProofSection.profile3_description: Tech blogs, documentation sites, developer resources with 500-10K articles and code snippets.
SocialProofSection.profile3_pain_description: Losing traffic to ChatGPT for 'how-to' queries. Code examples not rendering.
SocialProofSection.profile3_solution_description: Get cited as the authoritative source in AI developer tool answers
SocialProofSection.profile3_roi: ROI: Maintain thought leadership in AI era
SocialProofSection.profile4_description: Large-scale customer portals, knowledge bases, and internal tools with complex JavaScript frameworks.
SocialProofSection.profile4_pain_description: Support docs invisible to AI. Customers can't find answers via ChatGPT.
SocialProofSection.profile4_solution_description: Knowledge base content accessible via AI assistants, reducing support tickets

LandingFeatures.subtitle: AI-First Features
LandingFeatures.title: Built for AI Search. Not an Afterthought.
LandingFeatures.description: Everything you need to dominate AI search results
LandingFeatures.feature1_description: Get real-time alerts when ChatGPT, Perplexity, or Claude cite your content. Track which pages drive the most AI visibility.
LandingFeatures.feature2_description: Lightning-fast JavaScript rendering optimized for AI crawlers. Your content loads before they timeout.
LandingFeatures.feature3_description: Automatically inject LLM-friendly structured data that AI models love. No manual schema.org markup needed.
LandingFeatures.feature4_description: See exactly which AI crawlers visit your site, what they index, and how often. GPTBot, PerplexityBot, ClaudeBot tracking.
LandingFeatures.feature5_description: Simple middleware integration. Works with Next.js, React, Vue, Angular. No code changes to your app.
LandingFeatures.feature6_description: Optimized for ChatGPT Search, Perplexity, Claude, and emerging AI search engines. Auto-updates as new crawlers launch.

ComparisonSection.subtitle: Why CrawlReady?
ComparisonSection.title: Built for AI Search. Not an Afterthought.
ComparisonSection.description: See how we compare to Prerender.io and DIY solutions
ComparisonSection.bottom_text: 40% cheaper than Prerender.io. 99% faster than building it yourself.

MarketOpportunitySection.title: The AI Search Revolution is
MarketOpportunitySection.description: Early movers who optimize for AI citations today will dominate their categories tomorrow
MarketOpportunitySection.stat1_description: ChatGPT Search, Perplexity, and Claude are seeing explosive adoption. Users are shifting from Google to AI for answers.
MarketOpportunitySection.stat2_description: Nearly every modern website uses React, Vue, or Angular. But only 31% of AI crawlers can render JavaScript properly.
MarketOpportunitySection.stat3_description: Prerender.io serves 600K domains but captures only 1.2-3% of the addressable market. Massive opportunity remains.
MarketOpportunitySection.timeline_title: Why Now is the Perfect Time
MarketOpportunitySection.timeline1_description: OpenAI launches ChatGPT Search, making AI-powered search mainstream. 200M+ users now have direct access to AI search.
MarketOpportunitySection.timeline2_description: The first 100 brands in each category to optimize for AI citations will establish authority. Competition is still low.
MarketOpportunitySection.timeline3_description: Google integrates AI Overviews deeper. Perplexity grows to 100M+ users. Late movers struggle to catch up with established AI citations.
MarketOpportunitySection.bottom_text: Don't wait until your competitors dominate AI search.
MarketOpportunitySection.bottom_text2: Join the first 100 users and secure your AI visibility advantage today.
